## Scope check

Before merging, confirm the changes belong in this repository:

- [ ] Changes are part of the PromptCrafting SaaS application
- [ ] No standalone services or servers are introduced as subdirectories
- [ ] New dependencies serve the existing product (not a separate project)
- [ ] Any external integrations are referenced via package dependency or documentation, not vendored in

> See [Repository scope](../README.md#repository-scope) in the README for full guidelines.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Refactor / cleanup
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Dependency update
- [ ] CI/CD change
